Package magellan.library.utils

Class MagellanUrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.utils.MagellanUrl
  • public class MagellanUrl
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class maintaining important URLs for Magellan.
    Author:
    stm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String MAGELLAN_LOCATIONS_URL
      This URL should point to a file containing all other URLs (in properties file format:
      key1 = value1
      key2 = value2
      # ....
      static java.lang.String VERSION_NIGHTLY
      Key for nightly version
      static java.lang.String VERSION_RELEASE
      Key for stable version
      static java.lang.String WWW_BUGS
      Key for Magellan bugtracker URL
      static java.lang.String WWW_DOWNLOAD
      Key for download URL
      static java.lang.String WWW_FILES
      Key for files URL
      static java.lang.String WWW_ROOT
      Key for basic Magellan URL

    • Method Detail

      • getMagellanUrl

        public static java.lang.String getMagellanUrl​(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a URL, if possible fetched from the remote file at MAGELLAN_LOCATIONS_URL. Current url keys include "www.root", "www.bugtracker", "www.download", "version.release", "version.nightly".
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        The url for the key, null if it could not be found and isn't one of the default values.

      • retrieveLocations

        public static void retrieveLocations​(java.util.Properties properties)
        Tries to access the locations file remotely and read the values.
        Parameters:
        properties - Client settings, see HTTPClient(Properties)
        See Also:
        HTTPClient

      • retrieveLocations

        public static void retrieveLocations​(java.util.Properties properties,
                                     boolean force)
        Tries to access the locations file remotely and read the values.
        Parameters:
        properties - Client settings, see HTTPClient(Properties)
        force - If this is true, the timeout is ignored.
        See Also:
        HTTPClient

      • getRootUrl

        public static java.lang.String getRootUrl()
        Returns Magellan's primary WWW URL.
